name: Zainab
description: It is a wise notion that the beauty of a person`s heart speaks better qualities of his/her true character as the heart could not be masquerade and l am humble to say that in sincerity l am everyday striving to be the good lady that l genuinely desired to be and on that basis of inspiration is my guard, l am open and serious minded with great sense of humor, l am heartily tender and easy going with life and l am very sensitive to my feelings and that of others around me at every point in time. Basically my philosophy of life is live and let others live because nobody is perfect to judge another and with that understanding l always bear with others shortcomings and weakness and if all should reason as l do then the world would be a better place for all humanity to live in peace without prejudice. Above all l Am very kind and loving and peaceful with myself and nature. Permit me to say that l despise dishonesty and insincerity and if you are not sensitive and accommodating to others people feeling and pain then you are not a party to make this world a better place for all humanity.
